columns.Channel_ID: The unique identifier for each channel.
columns.Name: The name of the channel.
columns.Analogue_terrestrial_channel: The analogue channel number for terrestrial broadcasts.
columns.Digital_terrestrial_channel: The digital channel number for terrestrial broadcasts.
columns.Internet: The website URL for the channel.

channel.table_description: The table stores details about various broadcast channels.

columns.Director_ID: The unique identifier for each director.
columns.Name: The name of the director.
columns.Age: The age of the director in years.

director.table_description: The table stores information about directors associated with channels.

columns.Program_ID: The unique identifier for each program.
columns.Start_Year: The year the program started airing.
columns.Title: The title of the program.
columns.Director_ID: The unique identifier for the program's director.
columns.Channel_ID: The unique identifier for the channel broadcasting the program.

program.table_description: The table stores details about programs aired on various channels.

columns.Director_ID: The unique identifier for each director.
columns.Channel_ID: The unique identifier for each channel.
columns.Is_first_director: The indicator of whether the director is the first for the channel.

director_admin.table_description: The table links directors to their respective channels and indicates first directors.
